title: Adrastea - Book 2 of 2 (2014) (Scanlation) (phillywilly).cbr
description:
After spending 1000 years sitting on his stone throne, meditating on his immortal condition, a man, the ancient King of Hyperborea, leaves for Mount Olympus. Having seen his family and his people disappear in the course of a too-long life, he has finally decided to find the Gods to question them about his strange nature. Why him? How to die? Can he ever again find those he loved?
On his way, he meets men, women, gods, goddesses, who, according to their moods, their desires, their natures, their interests, each influence in their own way the destiny of the traveler, the man who is nothing but a shadow of himself, of his legend.
